naslov: Kuća, prodaja, Malinska, Sveti Vid, Luksuzna vila s bazenom (prodaja)
opis: Luksuzna vila s bazenom na otoku Krku,u mjestu Sveti Vid-Malinska. Novogradnja koja je useljiva do ljeta 2025. godine. Dvojnica, etažnosti prizemlje i kat (P+1), tlocrtne površine 199,87 m2. Kuća s bazenom je smještena na parceli od 510m2 te ima svoja 2 parkirna mjesta. Bazen je veličine 22m2 (6,4m x3,4m). U prizemlju kuće je dnevni dio sa terasom, hodnikom, toaletom i ostavom. Na katu se nalaze 3 spavaće sobe svaka sa svojom kupaonom i terasom. Iz kuće se pruža predivan pogled na more i Malinsku.  Sve su sobe klimatizirane (Toshiba), a u cijeloj je vili podno grijanje. Podovi u spc, vrhunska svijetla keramika u kupaonoma, prekrasna unutrašnja vrata i odlična stolarija. Lijepa i  ugodna lokacija na cca 1,5 km do plaža i centra Malinske. Čisto vlasništvo i uredni papiri gradnje. Luxury villa with pool on the island of Krk, in Sveti Vid - Malinska. New construction that can be moved into by the summer of 2025. Semi-detached house, ground floor and first floor (P+1), floor plan area 199.87 m2. The house with a swimming pool is located on a plot of 510 m2 and has its own 2 parking spaces. The size of the pool is 22m2 (6.4m x 3.4m). On the ground floor of the house there is a living room with a terrace, a corridor, a toilet and a storage room. Upstairs there are 3 bedrooms, each with its own bathroom and terrace.  All rooms are air-conditioned /Toshiba and the entire villa has underfloor heating. SPC floors, top-quality light ceramics in the bathrooms, beautiful interior doors and excellent joinery. Beautiful seaview, nice, quiet location only 1,5 kilometers from the first beaches and city centar.. Clean ownership and proper construction papers.
